Texts.Chs: 给你，上尉。^green;带上这块^orange;湖仙碎片^green;回去找阿科达^reset;，他可以把你一直在研究的工具组装起来。
Texts.Eng: Here you go, Captain. ^green;Bring this ^orange;Xanafian Shard^green; back to Adako^reset;, and he can put together that tool you've been working on.

Texts.Chs: 碎片完美契合！给你，上尉: 一把完全恢复的古人工具。
Texts.Eng: The Shard is a perfect fit! Here you go, Captain: one fully restored tool of the Old Ones.
